data.text: Nia Pharisee mono Sadduccee ne lloomoi gi Jesus belee hai a Mee gii hala. Ne helekai gi Mee gi heia dana mogobuna gi gidee ginaadou bolo God le e madalia Ia.16.1 Matthew 12.38; Luke 11.16
Jesus ga helekai gi digaula, “Di madagoaa di laa ga ulu, gei goodou e helekai boloo, ‘Daiaa le e humalia, idimaa, di langi le e mmee.’

Gei luada loo goodou e helekai boloo, ‘Dangi nei la ga uwauwa, idimaa, di langi le e mmee gei e haga bouli.’ Malaa, goodou e mee di iloo nia hagamodongoohia i di gili di langi, gei e deemee di iloo nia haga modongoohia o nia laangi aanei!

“Digau dolomeenei la gu huaidu huoloo, gei gu hagalee manawa dahi! Goodou e tangi mai gi di Au i di mogobuna? Deeai, delaa hua go di mogobuna ne hai gi Jonah gaa hai ko Au adu gi goodou.”16.4 Matthew 12.39; Luke 11.29
Nia dama agoago a Jesus ne dau adu gi di baahi i golo o tai, ga langahia bolo ginaadou digi kae nadau palaawaa.
Jesus ga helekai gi digaula, “Goodou gii pula i nia ‘yeast’ o nia Pharisee mono Sadduccee.”16.6 Luke 12.1
Digaula ga daamada ga helehelekai i nadau mehanga, “Mee e helekai beenei, idimaa, gidaadou digi gaamai tadau palaawaa.”
Jesus gu iloo Ia hua nia helekai digaula, ga heeu, “Goodou e aha ala e helehelekai bolo ma nia palaawaa ai? Godou hagadonu le e lligi!
Goodou digi donu? Goodou e hagalee langahia nia palaawaa e lima ala ne ginigini gaa duwwe gi nia daane e lima mana (5,000)? Nia gada e hia ala ne haa go goodou?16.9 Matthew 14.17-21
Gei nia palaawaa e hidu ang gi nia daane e haa mana (4,000), nia gada e hia ne haa go goodou?16.10 Matthew 15.34-38
Goodou e aha ala hagalee modongoohia bolo Au hagalee e helehelekai adu gi goodou i nia palaawaa? Goodou pula i goodou i nia ‘yeast’ o nia Pharisee mo nia Sadduccee!”
Ana dama agoago gu modongoohia laa bolo ma hagalee go nia ‘yeast’ ala i lodo di palaawaa e haga ligaliga iei ginaadou, ma go nia agoago o nia Pharisee mo nia Sadduccee.
Jesus ne hana gi di gowaa hoohoo gi di waahale Caesarea Philippi, ge Ia ga heeu gi ana dama agoago, “Nia daangada le e helehelekai bolo Tama Tangada la koai?”

Digaula ga helekai, “Hunu daangada e hai bolo Goe go John Babdais, hunu daangada bolo go Elijah, hunu daangada bolo go Jeremiah be tei dangada i nia soukohp.”16.14 Matthew 14.1-2; Mark 6.14-15; Luke 9.7-8
Gei Mee ga heeu gi digaula, “Goodou e hai bolo Au koai?”
Simon Peter ga helekai, “Goe go di Mesaia, go Tama di God Mouli!”16.16 John 6.68-69
Jesus ga helekai gi mee, “Gu humalia adu gi di goe, Simon, tama a John. Ma hagalee tangada ne haga modongoohia adu gi di goe di tonu o di mee deenei, ma go dogu Damana dela i di langi.
Malaa, Au e hagi adu gi di goe Peter: goe go di hadugalaa, gei Au ga haga duu dagu nohongo dabu i hongo di hagamau hadugalaa deenei, gei di made e deemee di hagahuaidu di maa.

Au ga gowadu nia gii Teenua King o God di Langi. Nia mee huogodoo ala ma gaa tai kooe i henuailala, e tai labelaa i di langi. Au mee ala ma gaa huge i henuailala, e huge labelaa i di langi.”16.19 Matthew 18.18; John 20.23
Jesus ga helekai gi ana dama agoago bolo gi hudee hagi aga ina bolo Ia go di Mesaia.

Daamada i di madagoaa deenei, Jesus ga helekai hagammaa ang gi ana dama agoago, “Au e hai loo gii hana gi Jerusalem e kae dogu hagaduadua damanaiee mai baahi nia dagi mmaadua, mo nia dagi hai mee dabu, mo nia gau haga donudonu haganoho. Au ga daaligi gii made, gei i muli nia laangi e dolu gei Au ga haga mouli aga.”
Peter gaa lahi Jesus gi mada ginaua, gaa hai ono ngudu gi mee, “Meenei dogu Dagi, Dimaadua gi bule ina di mee deenei gi de tale adu gi di Goe!”
Jesus gaa huli gi daha mo Peter ga helekai, “Setan, hana gi daha mo Au! Goe e haga deaadee Au, idimaa, au maanadu la nia maanadu hua dangada, hagalee nia maanadu mai baahi o God.”
Jesus ga helekai gi ana dama agoago, “Maa dahi dangada bolo ia e hanimoi gi di Au, geia gi wanga ina dehuia dono huaidina, aamo ina dono loobuu, daudalia mai Au.16.24 Matthew 10.38; Luke 14.27
Idimaa, tangada dela e hiihai e benebene dono mouli, geia e deemee di gidee di mouli, gei tangada dela ga deheia dono mouli i di Au, geia ga gidee di mouli.16.25 Matthew 10.39; Luke 17.33; John 12.25
Di humalia aha e kae go tangada maa ia ga hai mee gi henuailala hagatau, nomuli ga de gidee dono mouli? Hagalee, ma di mee i golo e dahidamee i do mouli?

Tama Tangada ga hoohoo dono hanimoi i lodo nia madamada o dono Damana, ana gau di langi e madalia. Ge Ia gaa hui tangada nei mo tangada nei gi di hagatau o nadau hegau.16.27 Matthew 25.31; Pisalem 62.12; Romans 2.6
Au e hagi adu gi goodou di tonu bolo hunu gau i ginei ga hagalee mmade, gaa dae loo gi nadau gidee gi Tama Tangada dela ga hanimoi gadoo be dahi king.”
